variable_description: Unique ID for each HOLC neighborhood (city, grade, and number)
City which the HOLC neighborhood is in
Credit worthiness grade / rating given to the HOLC neighborhood (A - D scale)
Original ID of the HOLC neighborhood (grade and number)
Year in which the HOLC neighborhood was assessed
Link to view the HOLC data (from the Mapping Inequality website)
Excerpts from the HOLC assessment's description of the HOLC neighborhood

Estimated CalEnviroScreen 4.0 score (Pollution Score multiplied by Population Characteristics Score) for the HOLC neighborhood (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Amount of daily maximum 8 hour Ozone concentration (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Annual mean PM 2.5 concentrations (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Diesel PM emissions from on-road and non-road sources (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Total pounds of selected active pesticide ingredients (filtered for hazard and volatility) used in production-agriculture per square mile in the census tract (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Toxicity-weighted concentrations of modeled chemical releases to air from facility emissions and off-site incineration (from RSEI) (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Traffic density, in vehicle-kilometers per hour per road length, within 150 meters of the census tract boundary (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Drinking water contaminant index for selected contaminants (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Potential risk for lead exposure in children living in low-income communities with older housing (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Cleanup sites, sum of weighted EnviroStor cleanup sites within buffered distances to populated blocks of census tracts (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Groundwater threats, sum of weighted GeoTracker leaking underground storage tank sites  within buffered distances to populated blocks of census tracts (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Sum of weighted hazardous waste facilities and large quantity generators within buffered distances to populated blocks of census tracts (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Impaired water bodies, sum of number of pollutants across all impaired water bodies within buffered distances to populated blocks of census tracts (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Sum of weighted solid waste sites and facilities (SWIS) within  buffered distances to populated blocks of census tracts (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)

Average of percentiles from the Pollution Burden indicators (with a half weighting for the Environmental Effects indicators) (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Pollution Burden variable scaled with a range of 0-10 (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Age-adjusted rate of emergency department visits for asthma (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Percent low birth weight (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Age-adjusted rate of emergency department visits for heart attacks per 10,000 (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Percent of population over 25 with less than a high school education (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Percent limited English speaking households (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Percent of population living below two times the federal poverty level (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Percent of the population over the age of 16 that is unemployed and eligible for the labor force (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Percent housing burdened low income households (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Average of percentiles from the Population Characteristics indicators (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Population Characteristics variable scaled with a range of 0-10. (Used to calculate CES 4.0 Score) (estimated for the HOLC neighborhood, from overlapping CalEnviroScreen 4.0 census tracts)
Estimated total current population of the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current population of children (under 10 years old) in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current population between 10 and 64 years old in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current elderly population (age 65 years and older) in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current population of those who identify as Hispanic or Latino in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current population of those who identify as non-Hispanic white in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current population of those who identify as non-Hispanic African American or black in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current population of those who identify as non-Hispanic Native American in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current population of those who identify as non-Hispanic "other" or as multiple races in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Estimated current population of those who identify as non-Hispanic Asian or Pacific Islander in the HOLC neighborhood (based on 2015-2019 ACS population estimates for overlapping census tracts)
Geospatial data defining HOLC neighborhood polygons
